text: anaqareeb musharekeen kahengen ki agar khuda chaahata to na ham log shirk karate aur na hamaare baap daada aur na ham koee cheez apane oopar haraam karate usee tarah (baaten bana bana ke) jo log unase pahale ho guzare hain (paigambaron ko) jhuthalaate rahe yahaan tak ki un logon ne hamaare azaab (ke maze)e ko chakha (ai rasool) tum kaho ki tumhaare paas koee daleel hai (agar hai) to hamaare (dikhaane ke) vaaste usako nikaalo (daleel to kya) pesh karoge tum log to sirph apane khyaal khaam kee pairavee karate ho aur sirph atakal pachchoo baaten karate ho
